file_content.text: We're making real progress. The city computer network should be online in a few days.
How's it looking, Imani?
Power readings are stable, sir. No reason we can't go in.
The power generators are reset... and it's you we have to thank, am I right?
It was the least I could do. Your team's taking a risk out here, too.
I wanted to help.
No problem.
You got my thanks, at any rate.
I'll take credit, assuming I get paid for my troubles.
Is there a reward?
We've got--I'll find something for you.
We should get back to it. We lost time, and there's still a long way to go before systems integrity is restored.
Pleasure working with you, sir!
Unless someone puts the generators into emergency mode, there's not much we can do.
Three... two....
Damn it! Shut it off! Shut it off! Everyone okay?
Just a few burns. I'm--ah!--I'm sorry, sir. We didn't get anything.
What's your team trying to do?
What's going on?
That looked like a nasty shock. You should see a medic.
Are you alright?
Yes, thank you. I'll do that, Master Jedi.
Hold still. I'll fix up your hands, but you should see a medic.
Let me heal you.
Oh. Thank you. That does feel better.
Just be glad you're still alive. That was a nasty shock.
Buck up, soldier.
I'm okay, sir. No need to worry about me.
Nasty shock. Just be glad you weren't holding a wet hydrospanner.
Ouch.
Or standing knee-deep in the swamp. You should've been here yesterday--ah....
This is pathetic.
Excuse me? You have any idea what you're talking about?
We're supposed to get the old city computer systems back online. My team's been soldering hardware for weeks.
Problem is, some of the power systems are still operational. We keep hitting electrical surges, someone's going to get killed.
Engineering Team Gamma was supposed to find the generators and set them to emergency mode--but that ain't happening now.
Gamma can't do the job?
Why not?
Not without a lot bigger guns than we've been issued.
Don't tell me--the friendly Taris wildlife is causing problems?
I bet I can guess why.
That's what they keep telling us.
So what?
You want the Republic to stay on the planet, the reconstruction needs to move forward. Right now it's not.
Maybe there's credits in it for you if you help out.
The generators are outside the safe zone. Area's crawling with rakghouls and prowlers.
Until someone regulates the power, my team can't do a thing. I'm sure you've got your own problems--but if you can lend a hand, don't be shy.
Not now--one wrong move and my whole team gets electrocuted....
